name: Yellowbird (VerzatileDev)
description:
The Game is about, a yellow bird on a journey an infinite runner, with obstacles & pipes avoided score. The user's task is to reach as far as possible and enjoy the game.

Current period of the Game:

+ Working Menu (Pause & Main)

+ Working sound system (Music / Audio controls).

+ Player can respawn, and the game goes on infinitely as long as the player stays alive.

+ Player Controls are show on the bottom of the screen.

+ Funny voices / sounds.

- Gets repetitive after a while.

- Graphically not fully finalized, but the game in itself is in working order.

Hope you enjoy the Game as well as the experience!
